body.p:
LOUISVILLE HOTEL
REBUILT 1856. ENLARGED &amp REFURBISHED 1859.
KEAN STEELE & JUDGE Proprieters.
Cor Sixth & Main Str. LOUISVILLE KY.

Louisville Ky May 8th 1865
Gov Tho E Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Dear Father.

I have the pleasure of recommending Capt Fr. de Tavernier, to you as for commission as A. D. C. with rank as Col. Whilst I had the responsibilities of a Brigade on my hands, ^the^ Capt D was A. A. A. G. and always discharged his duties with promptness and fidelity. He is now about to return to his "the old country," and as a compliment to him for his services (although not appointed from this state) in Suppression assisting in the suppression of this unholy rebellion, I suggest him for the position.

Your afft. son
J. T. Bramlette
Lt Col &C
